bibl.title: A Foundation Plaque of Ptolemy IV.
bibl.note: New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art, Acc. No. 48.45. Opaque glass. Foundation deposit (hieroglyphic and Greek) from a shrine of Aphrodite Urania. Deir el-Medineh, reign of Ptolemy IV. - S.E.G. XVI, 860.
bibl.seg: Hayes William C., A Foundation Plaque of Ptolemy IV.

New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art, Acc. No. 48.45. Opaque glass. Foundation deposit (hieroglyphic and Greek) from a shrine of Aphrodite Urania. Deir el-Medineh, reign of Ptolemy IV. - S.E.G. XVI, 860.
